channel.title: LaTeX on Álvaro A. Gutiérrez Vargas
channel.description: Recent content in LaTeX on Álvaro A. Gutiérrez Vargas

item.title: TikZ coordinate graph from scratch. The simple, but effective way.
item.description: Lately I really keen to create a couple of graphs to exemplify something in a manuscript that I have been working. Even though, I was somehow familiar with TikZ, given the immense amount of templates online it was quite difficult to stick to only one, because most of them had so many unnesesary features for my purpose. Finally, using the two references listed at the bottom I came up with something quite useful and intuitive to solve my problem.

item.title: [Oto-2019] StataLaTeX Combo
item.description: Este es un compedio del material impartido en el Taller Stata & LaTeX a los alumnos del curso de Econometría Financiera del Master de Finanzas de la Universidad de Chile. S01: Introduccion a LaTeX Enunciado S02: Estadística Descriptiva Enunciado Solución Data S03: Manejo de Bases de Datos Enunciado Solución Data S04: Trabajo con Multi-bases de Datos Enunciado Solución Data S05: Loops & Macros & Automatización Season 1 Enunciado Solución Data
